amendment.description: An amendment in the nature of a substitute recommended by the Committee on Ways and Means now printed in the bill, as modified by the amendments printed in House Report 105-380, and considered as adopted pursuant to H. Res. 303.

action.text: Amendment (A001) in the nature of a substitute considered as adopted pursuant to the provisions of H. Res. 303.
Ways and Means amendment (A001) modified by unanimous consent.
On agreeing to the Ways and Means amendment (A001) as modified Agreed to without objection.
